entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 p.m. CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023
